member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams
member.summary: Represents activation parameters for a spatial audio render stream for metadata. Pass this structure to when activating a stream.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.ObjectFormat
member.summary: Format descriptor for a single spatial audio object. All objects used by the stream must have the same format and the format must be of type or WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.StaticObjectTypeMask
member.summary: A bitwise combination of AudioObjectType values indicating the set of static spatial audio channels that will be allowed by the activated stream.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.MinDynamicObjectCount
member.summary: The minimum number of concurrent dynamic objects. If this number of dynamic audio objects can't be activated simultaneously, will fail with this error SPTLAUDCLNT_E_NO_MORE_OBJECTS.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.MaxDynamicObjectCount
member.summary: The maximum number of concurrent dynamic objects that can be activated with .

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.Category
member.summary: The category of the audio stream and its spatial audio objects.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.EventHandle
member.summary: The event that will signal the client to provide more audio data. This handle will be duplicated internally before it is used.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.MetadataFormatId
member.summary: The identifier of the metadata format for the currently active spatial rendering engine.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.MaxMetadataItemCount
member.summary: The maximum number of metadata items per frame.

member.name: SpatialAudioObjectRenderStreamForMetadataActivationParams.NotifyObject
member.summary: The object that provides notifications for spatial audio clients to respond to changes in the state of an . This object is used to notify clients that the number of dynamic spatial audio objects that can be activated concurrently is about to change.
